page.shortlink: UX Repeating Sections Add Row icon
page.description: The icon shown for the 'Add Row' button.
page.discussion: Specify the icon for the 'Add Row' button. Set to '<Specified by Style>' to use the icon defined in the UX Component's style.
page.note: The *[ui:'Add Row' icon]* property is only available if the [Has 'Add Row' button] property is checked.
